name: Mini Knight (itch) (PracticalGameDev)
description:
Mini Knight was created for a game Jam. A great learning experience and a great bit of progress was made on my journey to understand the Godot engine. Character pixel art and coding by myself, some tiles and audio from Open Game Art.

Destroy the huts to open the Boss gate, defeat the boss to return to the map, unless you die first...

Arrow keys to move, Left Mouse to Hit and Right mouse to use shield.
